attributes.action: Bring up the wages for support workers
attributes.background: Minimum wage isn't enough for what support worker have to go through day to day. This will help keep good hard workin staff in the same environment to make sure services users get the best care all round!!

rejection.details:
We're not sure who you mean by "support workers". If you start a new petition explaining more clearly what you would like to happen, we could look at this again.

You will also need to give your full name to start a petition.
